org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.api

Interface PackageGenerationService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PackageGenerator

    public interface PackageGenerationService
extends PackageGenerator
    Manages the package generation workflow.

    Upon generatePackage(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageState, org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageGenerationParameters), this service will invoke an appropriate instance of PackageGenerator to generate a package of the requested form.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Package generatePackage(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageState packageState, org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageGenerationParameters params)
      Invoke the corresponding PackageGenerator to generate the requested package.

    • Method Detail

      • generatePackage

        Package generatePackage(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageState packageState,
                        org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageGenerationParameters params)
                 throws org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageToolException
        Invoke the corresponding PackageGenerator to generate the requested package.
        Specified by:
        generatePackage in interface PackageGenerator
        Parameters:
        packageState - a state object containing information about the package and its custodial content
        params - Execution parameters that specify user's choices among the package generation preferences. An appropriate PackageGeneration implementation will be selected based upon the contents of these params
        Returns:
        the package
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if there is a problem generating the package.
        org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageToolException
